text: is a Japanese actress and singer. She sang many pupular songs, mostly in her younger days. She is also known for her roles as Sakura in the Otoko wa Tsurai yo series from 1969 until 1995. She acted in many movies directed by Yōji Yamada. She won the award for best actress at the 5th Hochi Film Award for A Distant Cry from Spring. ==Hit songs== Her hit song were as follows. *さよならはダンスの後に *下町の太陽 *おはなはんの歌 *忘れな草をあなたに *オホーツクの舟唄 ==Notes== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese singers Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Actors from Tokyo
title: Chieko Baisho
